MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH44 postcode area of Innerleithen. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have identified a faulty fuse unit on our high voltage network and have began working on the repairs required. Due to on site delays, we now expect your supply to be restored by 1:30am. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:35pm on Monday, 11th January 2021
